details: Designed and implemented a Python-based solution for a confidential project, focusing on automation and data processing.
Prioritized security of confidential data throughout development.
Collaborated with the client for system deployment.
Conducted rigorous testing to ensure compliance with client requirements.
Led the development of 'ARQViz', a VR visualization and project management tool.
Built integration pipelines using Ruby and Unreal Engine 5 for SketchUp models.
Utilized C++, Python, Java, and TypeScript to enhance application features and web interface.
Deployed AR/VR solutions tailored to client architectural projects.
Researched and developed VR/AR applications with Unity 3D and Google ARCore.
Focused on immersive training tools under NDA.
Scripted interactions using C# and tested with Blaze.
Delivered projects collaboratively within a 3-member team.
Simulated the Mexican Caribbean environment in VR using Unity and ARCore.
Collaborated with a multidisciplinary academic team under Dr. David Israel Flores Granados.
Designed immersive and interactive user experiences.
Implemented development using C# in Unity.
Taught competitive programming in C++, Python, and Java to high school students.
Prepared students for the Mexican Computer Science Olympiad.
Mentored elementary and secondary students in algorithmic thinking using 'Karel the Robot'.
Organized mock contests and evaluated algorithmic solutions.
Delivered a programming teaching course based on problem-based learning.
Trained educators in integrating algorithmic thinking into classes.
Handled technical support during sessions and taught array structures.
Contributed to curriculum enhancement for tech educators.
